channel.title: Safety on PRU Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Safety on PRU Portal

item.title: PRU safety performance analysis in AeroSafety World magazine
item.description: PRU safety performance analysis in July/August 2015 issue of AeroSafety World. Figure 1: AeroSafety World July/August 2015. The article “Positive Trends” in the July/August 2015 issue of AeroSafety World, gives an overview of safety performance analysis performed by EUROCONTROL PRU and published in the 2014 Performance Review Report.
